function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited and diminishing use of park spaces in marginalized communities during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate exploration of factors influencing park use in minority communities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for public health regulations’ influence on park use during covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skepticism and concern regarding virus transmission in public spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in park visitation from past park visitors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited access to parks for lower-income individuals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant declines in urban park visitation during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of preexisting disparities in park use due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable patterns of outdoor recreation and park use during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative association between higher svi scores and park visits","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant predictor of declines in park visitation based on social vulnerability race/ethnicity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in park use during covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Park use patterns are linked to park access and proximity, increasing the potential for contagious disease spread through crowded park use.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Politically-driven variability in covid-19 restrictions across municipalities in the state leads to inconsistent enforcement of guidelines, affecting disease control measures in parks.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of svi to predict community vulnerability and health risks due to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on social vulnerability index svi for characterizing socio-demographic attributes may not capture all relevant factors related to contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased park use during covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of cell phone location data for research purposes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in park use based on income and education level","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disparities in park use based on race/ethnicity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in park use during covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The study involves examining the impact of covid-19 on park use and demographic attributes, which may reveal potential risks of disease transmission in outdoor spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of demographic information may lead to potential privacy risks if not handled securely.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gathering information on income and education levels may lead to socioeconomic biases and discrimination.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey instrument questions related to outdoor recreational park use and factors affecting use.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of other recreational facilities due to pandemic restrictions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demographic information collection including gender and age.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial and ethnic diversity can impact the diseases within urban areas.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban park use during the pandemic can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases among different groups within the community.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underrepresentation of socially vulnerable communities in survey data","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in urban park use during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial and socioeconomic disparities in covid-19 impact and risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alleviating misinformation sharing and cyberchondria through reducing cognitive load","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-sectional
